title: Fajita Stew
ingredients: 2 lb boneless beef top-round steak, fat-trimmed and cut into 2" pieces
1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes, with juice
1 red bell pepper, cut into 1" pieces
directions: Combine beef and onion in slow cooker.
In a medium bowl, mix fajita seasoning and tomatoes. Add to cooker and top with pepper.
Cover. Cook on low 6 to 8 hours.
In a small bowl, combine flour and 1/4 cup water. Stir well to mix and gradually add to slow cooker. Cover.
Cok on high for 15 to 20 more minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally.
